jobDescription: This role will develop, execute, analyze, and optimize acquisition and retargeting campaigns across several paid advertising channels, including: Google AdWords, Facebook and Instagram. You will be the in-house advertising product expert.  Working closely with the Director of Acquisition Marketing, youll oversee Homesnaps paid ads for real estate agents and analyze data to improve campaign performance. If you love using data in a test and learn" environment to drive high-impact projects, this position is for you.Core Responsibilities
